alert.note: Alert for Coconino (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued August 19 at 8:43AM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 245 PM MST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of north central Arizona, including the following county, Coconino. * WHEN...Until 245 PM MST Friday. * IMPACTS...Flooding of creeks and normally dry washes is imminent or occurring. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 840 AM MST, Flooding is ongoing in the warned area. - This includes the following creeks, washes and rivers... Moenkopi Wash. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Moenkopi Wash. - This includes the following highways... U.S. Highway 89 between mile markers 477 and 479. State Route 264 between mile markers 323 and 325. - Visit www.weather.gov/safety/flood for more information on flood safety.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Move to higher ground now. Act quickly to protect your life.
